name: AppleSnake
description:
AppleSnake is a logical game where you are a snake!
The kingdom of snakes does not accept our hero. He believes that we need to live in peace with other animals, and we need to eat apples. The elders of the kingdom of snakes decided to test Snapple and said:
"If you pass the test strip, eat everything and survive, we will think over your proposal and we will not turn them out."
Help the hero to save the animals and bring peace!
You are expected:
Varied levels and much, much more!

Use xbox controller to enjoy the game
